name: GuessNumber
0:
”Alexa, open guess number.”
”Alexa, start guess number.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess number
des:
The game's rule: The system generates a random number "A", and the player gives a random number "B". The system gives a relationship to "B" and "A", and the player guesses the correct answer from the cue.
You can get the game rule tips by saying "help".
Family users can recommend this game to their children, and children can improve their mathematical logic level in the game.
Now enjoy the fun of the game
